{{portal|Stargate|Stargate-color.png}}
 
The '''Asurans''' are a fictional race in the [[science fiction]] series ''[[Stargate Atlantis]]'' that bear many similarities to the [[Replicator (Stargate)#Human-form Replicators|human-form Replicators]] of ''[[Stargate SG-1]]''. These similarities have led the Asurans to simply be called "Replicators" by other characters on the show. They are first introduced in the season 3 episode {{sgcite|Progeny|Atlantis}}. Their name is based on [[demons]] in [[Hindu mythology]] called [[Asuras]].
The '''Asurans''' are a fictional race in the [[science fiction]] series ''[[Stargate Atlantis]]'' that bear many similarities to the [[Replicator (Stargate)#Human-form Replicators|human-form Replicators]] of ''[[Stargate SG-1]]''. These similarities have led the Asurans to simply be called "Replicators" by other characters on the show. They are first introduced in the season 3 episode {{sgcite|Progeny|Atlantis}}. Their name is based on [[demons]] in [[Hindu mythology]] called [[Asuras]].
